Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.20575512] Cytotoxicity on the human lymphoma cell line U-937 GTB(IC50 around 1 ÂµM).
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism. It shows haemolytic activity.
Sequence Information.PTM: This is a cyclic peptide which contains three disulfide bonds 4-21; 8-23; 13-28.
